Sentence.sentence: In other words, our inner caveman is continually looking over his shoulder to see what the rest of the tribe are up to.
I happened to meet with a youngish-looking man with a 3-year-old boy around his shoulders.
Obama's success isn't all good news for black Americans As Erin White watched the election results head towards victory for Barack Obama, she felt a burden lifting from her shoulders

word_mean: 肩：臂与躯干连接处，也指背部肩胛骨所围
肩，指进流段或去流段紧邻平行中体的部分，与进流段紧邻部分称“前肩(forward shoulder)”，与去流段紧邻部分称“后肩(after shoulder)”。

someone who listens sympathetically to someone's problems
To apply oneself vigorously; make a concentrated effort.

jx.jx_en_mean: In close proximity; side by side.

jx.jx_cn_mean: 从正面：直接被从肩部出的一拳击中的。用于拳击

entry.def: Your shoulders are between your neck and the tops of your arms.

example.ex: She led him to an armchair, with her arm round his shoulder...
example.tran: 她揽着他的肩膀，将他领到一把扶手椅旁。

example.ex: He glanced over his shoulder and saw me watching him.
example.tran: 他扭头瞥了一眼，看见我正看他。

entry.def: The shoulders of a piece of clothing are the parts that cover your shoulders.

example.ex: ...extravagant fashions with padded shoulders.
example.tran: 带垫肩的华丽时装

entry.def: When you talk about someone's problems or responsibilities, you can say that they carry them on their shoulders .
entry.tran: (问题、责任等)由…承担，落在…肩上

example.ex: No one suspected the anguish he carried on his shoulders...
example.tran: 没人觉察出他所承担的痛苦。

example.ex: I fervently hope he recognizes and understands the burden that's on his shoulders.
example.tran: 我热诚地希望他能认识到并懂得自己肩负的重任。

entry.def: If you shoulder the responsibility or the blame for something, you accept it.

example.ex: He has had to shoulder the responsibility of his father's mistakes...
example.tran: 他得为他父亲的过错承担责任。

example.ex: Some of the blame for the disastrous night must be shouldered by the promoters.
example.tran: 筹办方必须为那个灾难性的夜晚承担一部分责任。

entry.def: If you shoulder something heavy, you put it across one of your shoulders so that you can carry it more easily.

example.ex: The rest of the group shouldered their bags, gritted their teeth and set off...
example.tran: 那群人中其余的人扛起包，咬着牙出发了。

example.ex: He shouldered his bike and walked across the finish line.
example.tran: 他扛着自行车走过了终点线。

entry.def: If you shoulder someone aside or if you shoulder your way somewhere, you push past people roughly using your shoulder.

example.ex: The policemen rushed past him, shouldering him aside...
example.tran: 警察从他身边匆匆而过，把他挤到一边。

example.ex: She could do nothing to stop him as he shouldered his way into the house...
example.tran: 他使劲往屋子里挤，她根本没法儿阻止他。

entry.def: A shoulder is a joint of meat from the upper part of the front leg of an animal.

example.ex: ...shoulder of lamb.
example.tran: 小羊的前腿连肩肉

entry.def: If someone offers you a shoulder to cry on or is a shoulder to cry on, they listen sympathetically as you talk about your troubles.

example.ex: Mrs Barrantes longs to be at her daughter's side to offer her a shoulder to cry on...
example.tran: 巴兰特斯夫人很希望能在女儿身边听她倾诉。

example.ex: Roland sometimes saw me as a shoulder to cry on.
example.tran: 罗兰有时把我看作是一个可以倾诉的对象。

entry.def: If you say that someone or something stands head and shoulders above other people or things, you mean that they are a lot better than them.

example.ex: The two candidates stood head and shoulders above the rest...
example.tran: 这两名候选人从所有人中脱颖而出。

example.ex: I am very impressed by your magazine. It is head and shoulders above any other.
example.tran: 我对你们的杂志印象非常深刻。感觉比其他杂志好多了。

entry.def: If you say that someone is looking over their shoulder, you mean that they feel anxious all the time about what someone may do to them.
entry.tran: 惴惴不安;小心翼翼;小心提防

example.ex: When a company keeps making people redundant, those who are left behind might start looking over their shoulder.
example.tran: 当一家公司不停地裁员时，那些留下来的员工也会开始惴惴不安了。

entry.def: If two or more people stand shoulder to shoulder, they are standing next to each other, with their shoulders touching.

example.ex: They fell into step, walking shoulder to shoulder with their heads bent against the rain...
example.tran: 他们开始迈着一致的步伐并肩而行，低着头躲避雨水。

example.ex: We went on board and saw these people packed shoulder to shoulder on the decks.
example.tran: 我们上了船，看见这些人在甲板上肩挨着肩挤在一起。

entry.def: If people work or stand shoulder to shoulder, they work together in order to achieve something, or support each other.

example.ex: They could fight shoulder-to-shoulder against a common enemy...
example.tran: 他们可以同心协力，对抗共同的敌人。

example.ex: We will need you and the chairman standing shoulder to shoulder on basic positions.
example.tran: 我们需要你和主席在一些基本立场上共同进退。

means.word_mean: 1. the part of the body between the neck and the upper arm
2. a cut of beef from the shoulder of the animal
3. a ball-and-socket joint between the head of the humerus and a cavity of the scapula
4. narrow edge of land (usually unpaved) along the side of a road
1. lift onto one's shoulders
2. push with the shoulders;

sentences.sentence: "He shouldered his way into the crowd"

means.word_mean: 3. carry a burden, either real or metaphoric;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English sculdor, of West Germanic origin; related to Dutch schouder and German Schulter

sentences.en: Railway tracks on both sides of the embankment top is called the hard shoulder.

sentences.cn: 沥青和沙砾已经用于重铺向东的路面及部分路肩.
sentences.en: Tar and gravel have been used to resurface the eastbound lane and, in places, the shoulder.

sentences.cn: 七驾驶车辆违规行驶高速公路路肩者.
sentences.en: Persons drive against traffic regulations on shoulders of highways.

sentences.cn: 对不起, 不行. 我得找个路肩. 那里停车比较安全.
sentences.en: Sorry, I can not. I have to find a shoulder. It is safe to stop there.

sentences.cn: 我们应该补修一下这条公路的路肩了.
sentences.en: We should repair the road shoulders of the highway.

sentences.cn: 让我们把车推到路肩检查一下.
sentences.en: Let's pull over to the shoulder and check.

sentences.cn: 由于刹车太急，车子侧滑到了满是尘土的路肩上。
sentences.en: The car pulled up too fast and skidded on the dusty shoulder of the road.

sentences.cn: 如果你的车坏在路肩上了，就得等警察或修理站来帮忙。
sentences.en: If you stop on the hard shoulder, wait for the police or breakdown service.

sentences.cn: 海军某试验区担负着水中兵器的试验鉴定任务.
sentences.en: A test base of the PLA Navy shoulders the task of testing and appraising underwater weapons.

sentences.cn: 长子该担负起家庭的重担.
sentences.en: The oldest son should shoulder the burdens of the family.

sentences.cn: 同时, 监管部门亦应担负起相应的责任.
sentences.en: At the same time, the Supervisory department should also shoulder the corresponding responsibility.

sentences.cn: 每个青年都要担负这个责任.
sentences.en: Each young person must shoulder his responsibility.

sentences.cn: 研究所所长担负的责任重大.
sentences.en: The head of the research institute has a great responsibility on his shoulders.

sentences.cn: 他将担负那工作.
sentences.en: He'll shoulder the task.

sentences.cn: 民族院校担负着促进民族地区经济发展的历史使命.
sentences.en: Ethnic universities and colleges shoulder the historical task of promoting economic development of ethnic regions.

sentences.cn: 一连四年他肩负着几乎是难以担负的重担.
sentences.en: For four years he shouldered an almost unbearable burden.

sentences.cn: 对某事承担责任 / 过失
sentences.en: to shoulder the responsibility/blame for sth

sentences.cn: 既抚养孩子又做全职工作，承担着双重负担的妇女
sentences.en: women who shoulder the double burden of childcare and full-time work

sentences.cn: 没人觉察出他所承担的痛苦。
sentences.en: No one suspected the anguish he carried on his shoulders...

sentences.cn: 他得为他父亲的过错承担责任。
sentences.en: He has had to shoulder the responsibility of his father's mistakes...

sentences.cn: 筹办方必须为那个灾难性的夜晚承担一部分责任。
sentences.en: Some of the blame for the disastrous night must be shouldered by the promoters.

sentences.cn: 在某种程度上，房地产行业必须承担责任。
sentences.en: To some extent the housing sector must shoulder theblame.

sentences.cn: 保险人违反抗辩义务,必须承担相应的法律责任.
sentences.en: The insurer who fails to perform the obligation must shoulder corresponding liability.

sentences.cn: 经理愿意承担过失.
sentences.en: The manager was ready to shoulder the blame.

sentences.cn: 她承担了那天的所有过错.
sentences.en: She shouldered the blame for all that had gone wrong that day.

sentences.cn: 两个人在一起,彼此是责任, 但我们必须要承担这些应该承担的责任.
sentences.en: There only duty after a long times, but we should shoulder them.

sentences.cn: 卫戍区承担着保护首都安全的重要责任.
sentences.en: The garrison command should shoulder the responsibility to protect the safety of the capital city.

sentences.cn: 承担整个城市的希望对他来说,也许是沉重的负担.
sentences.en: The and tear ofthe city's hopes were on your shoulders was too much for him.

sentences.cn: 你需要为这份工作承担更多的责任.
sentences.en: You need to have broad shoulders for this job.

sentences.cn: 轻信者需要有一副宽阔的肩膀,才好承担后果.
sentences.en: Quick believers need broad shoulders.

sentences.cn: 艰苦的工作就象担子,摆在我们的面前, 看我们敢不敢承担.
sentences.en: Hard work is like a load placed before us, challenging us shoulder it.

sentences.cn: 申请人对发布媒体有特别要求时,应承担一部分发布费用.
sentences.en: Applicants for a special publication at the request of the media shoulder of publication costs.

sentences.cn: 通常,人们都不会自愿选择承担责任.
sentences.en: People do not usually shoulder responsibility by choice.

sentences.cn: 有关公寓单元的维修及维护费用由谁来承担?
sentences.en: Q 15. Who will shoulder the repairs and maintenance of the unit?

sentences.cn: 我们许多人都愿意别人来承担责任.
sentences.en: Many of us will rather someone else shoulder the responsibility.

sentences.cn: 单位必须是依法成立并存续的 、 具有一定组织机构、能够独立承担刑事责任的组织.
sentences.en: Meanwhile, it always be there, have some organizational and can independently shoulder the criminal liability.

sentences.cn: 问题15:有关公寓单元的维修及维护费用由谁来承担?
sentences.en: Who will shoulder the repairs and maintenance of the unit?

sentences.cn: 你要承担自己的那部分责任.
sentences.en: You should shoulder your share of the responsibility.

sentences.cn: 他承担了儿子的债务.
sentences.en: He shouldered his son's debts.

sentences.cn: 她不承担该过失的全部责任.
sentences.en: She won't shoulder all the blame for the mistake.

sentences.cn: 修威特说,他希望他不必一肩承担所有澳洲人的期待.
sentences.en: Hewitt said he hopes he doesn't have to shoulder alone the wait of all Australians.

sentences.cn: 具有良好的职业精神和创业激情, 勇于承担任务和责任.
sentences.en: With professional enthusiasm and entrepreneurial spirit, the courage to shoulder the task and responsibility.

sentences.cn: 不管瑞士银行家们可能会如何抱怨外国势力的干预, 他们都必须承担相当大的责任.
sentences.en: However much they might complain about foreign interference, Swiss bankers must shoulder much of the blame.

sentences.cn: 沙特阿拉伯将承担大部分减产责任.
sentences.en: Saudi Arabia will shoulder the bulk of the reduction.

sentences.cn: 泰勒先生必须承担很多指责.
sentences.en: Mr Taylor must shoulder much of the blame.

sentences.cn: 给需要的人一个肩膀, 挑起他的重担.
sentences.en: Give shoulder to those in need, share their burdens.

sentences.cn: 我使她的肩膀能挑起整个世界的重担, 并且柔情似水.
sentences.en: I made shoulder strong to carry the weight of the world. Yet , gentleto give comfort.

sentences.cn: 他年轻的肩膀能够挑起这千斤重担 吗 ?
sentences.en: Can he shoulder the heavy responsibility when he is so young?

sentences.cn: 他挑起担子颤悠颤悠地走了.
sentences.en: He shouldered the loaded carrying pole and walked off with a swing.

sentences.cn: Morgenes点点头, Simon用肩顶开了门.
sentences.en: Morgenes nodded his head, and Simon shouldered the door open.

Sentence.sentence: The little boy walked out of the school with his head and shoulders hanging down.
To avoid fooling yourself, watch out for excuses and try this test: Ask how you would feel if your actions were public and anyone could be watching over yourshoulder.
Have others watch over his shoulder
Some tables will arrive on a Sunday, order a whole chicken and a shoulder of lamb or a baby pig, and just stay for hours enjoying everything we bring out for them.
See a doctor about her strained shoulder
